title: Sum of List
description: Return the sum of all numbers in a list using reduce().

title: Find Maximum Value
description: Return the maximum value in a numeric list.

title: Count Vowels in String
description: Count how many vowels appear in a string.

title: Remove Duplicate Elements
description: Remove duplicate integers while preserving order.
hints: Use Set to track seen values.

title: Check Palindrome
description: Check if a string is a palindrome ignoring case.

title: Word Frequency Counter
description: Return a map of word frequencies in a sentence.

title: Sort Strings Alphabetically
description: Sort a list of strings in ascending order.
hints: Dart's sort() sorts alphabetically by default.

title: Filter Even Numbers
description: Return only even numbers from a list.

title: Square Each Number
description: Return a list of squared integers using map().

title: Check Key in Map
description: Check if a key exists inside a map using containsKey().
